doc.field: A Rhesus Monkey With a Naturally Occurring Impairment of Disparity Vergence. I. Behavioral Comparisons to Vergence in a Normal Animal.,"Implantable collamer lenses (ICL) carry a risk of prolapse caused by direct ocular trauma, especially in mesopic conditions and when oversized ICLs are implanted. We recommend early surgical repositioning, as well as patient education that encourages goggle use during active sports. "
